rows.description: The rows to insert into the sheet. An an array of objects where keys are the column names and values are the values to insert.

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetAppendMany request property "rows" should be an array.

items.description: The row to insert into the sheet. An object where keys are the column names and values are the values to insert.

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetAppendMany request property "rows" should be an array of objects.
GoogleSheetAppendMany request properties should be an object.

required.rows: GoogleSheetAppendMany request should have required property "rows".
